Tidio offers plans and pricing options tailored to the needs and budgets of small businesses. You can start using the help desk features with the Free Customer Service plan and upgrade to a paid option as your business grows.Will Tidio Help Desk enable me to create and manage tickets?Yes. The ticketing system automatically filters incoming tickets, enabling you to react quickly to urgent requests.
